units.title: Aggregate formation (Day -1)
units.text: 2 × 105 cells per mL on 6-well low-attachment plate 50 μM Y27632
units.rationale: Establishes uniform hPSC aggregates as the starting material for differentiation.

units.title: Mesoderm induction (Day 0)
units.text: Start mesoderm differentiation induction 12 μM CHIR99021, 30 ng/mL BMP-4
units.rationale: Activates WNT signaling and BMP4 to drive hPSCs toward a mesodermal fate.
